channel.title: Graduate Programs in Ceramics
channel.description:
Starting a list of links to graduate programs in Ceramics
**Alabama** University of Alabama - https://art.ua.edu/academics/ceramics/
**Alaska**
**Arizona** Arizona State University - https://art.asu.edu/degree-programs/ceramics
**Arkansas**
**California**
**Colorado** University of Colorado, Boulder - http://cuart.colorado.edu/programs/studio-art/ceramics/graduate-ceramics/
**Connecticut**
**Delaware**
**Florida** Florida State University - http://art.fsu.edu/programs-2/graduate/ University of Florida - http://arts.ufl.edu/academics/art-and-art-history/programs/ceramics/
**Georgia** Georgia State University - http://artdesign.gsu.edu/graduate/mfa-in-studio-concentrations/ceramics/
**Hawaii** University of Hawaii - http://hawaii.edu/art/degree_programs/index.html
**Idaho**
**Illinois** Southern Illinois University - http://cola.siu.edu/artanddesign/_common/documents/ceramic-inside.pdf
**Indiana** Indiana University Bloomington - https://studioart.indiana.edu/academics/studio-areas/ceramics/ Ball State University - http://cms.bsu.edu/academics/collegesanddepartments/art/undergradprograms/programareas/ceramics IUPUI Herron School of Art - https://herron.iupui.edu/academics/degrees/ceramics/mfa.html
**Iowa** University of Iowa - https://art.uiowa.edu/areas/dimensional-practice/ceramics
**Kansas** Kansas State University - http://art.ksu.edu/grad/ceramics/ University of Kansas - http://art.ku.edu/ceramics-studio-area Wichita State University - http://webs.wichita.edu/?u=adci&p=/majors/adci_ceramicsmedia/
**Kentucky** University of Kentucky - http://finearts.uky.edu/savs
**Louisiana** Louisiana State University - http://design.lsu.edu/art/programs/studio-arts/ceramics/
**Maine**
**Maryland**
**Massachusetts** University of Massachusetts, Dartmouth - http://www.umassd.edu/cvpa/graduate/artisanry/ceramics/
**Michigan** University of Michigan - http://stamps.umich.edu/graduate-programs/mfa Michigan State University - http://www.art.msu.edu/content/mfa-degrees Cranbrook University - http://cranbrookart.edu/ceramics/departmental-philosophy/
**Minnesota** University of Minnesota - https://cla.umn.edu/art/graduate
**Mississippi** University of Mississippi - http://art.olemiss.edu/mfa-in-studio-art/
**Missouri** University of Missouri - https://art.missouri.edu/mfa-program.html
**Montana** Montana State University - http://art.montana.edu/mfa-program.html University of Montana - http://www.umt.edu/art/programs-of-study/ceramics/default.php
**Nebraska** University of Nebraska, Lincoln - http://arts.unl.edu/art/ceramics
**Nevada**
**New Hampshire**
**New Jersey**
**New Mexico**
**New York** Alfred University - https://art.alfred.edu/graduate/mfa-ceramics/ SUNY New Paltz - https://www.newpaltz.edu/ceramics/
**North Carolina** Western Carolina University - https://www.wcu.edu/learn/departments-schools-colleges/fpa/artdesign/undergraduate-programs/studioart/index.aspx
**North Dakota**
**Ohio** Ohio University - https://www.ohio.edu/finearts/art/academics/programs/ceramics.cfm Ohio State University - https://art.osu.edu/areas/ceramics Kent State University - https://www.kent.edu/art/graduate-program-ceramics
**Oklahoma**
**Oregon**
**Pennsylvania** Penn State University - https://sova.psu.edu/apply/graduate-application/art-education-admission/mfa-application Tyler School of Art - https://tyler.temple.edu/programs/ceramics
**Rhode Island** Rhode Island School of Design - http://www.risd.edu/academics/ceramics/
**South Carolina**
**South Dakota**
**Tennessee**
**Texas** Texas Tech University - http://www.depts.ttu.edu/ART/SOA/nav/grad/studioart/ceramics/ceramics.php
**Utah** Utah State University - https://art.usu.edu/area_of_study/ceramics
**Vermont**
**Virginia**
**Washington** University of Washington - https://art.washington.edu/graduate-students
**West Virginia** West Virginia University - http://artanddesign.wvu.edu/
**Wisconsin** University of Wisconsin, Madison - https://art.wisc.edu/media-disciplines/3d/
**Wyoming**
We can add more later, I just thought I'd get this thread going.

item.title: Graduate Programs in Ceramics
item.dc:creator: derek
item.description:
Great idea. Created an “Education” category and moved this Topic there.
